alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin; Tift; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 5:31PM EST until January 12 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Irwin County in south central Georgia... Turner County in south central Georgia... Northern Tift County in south central Georgia... Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 615 PM EST. * At 530 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ty Ty, or 9 miles east of Sylvester, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Sylvester, Ashburn, Ocilla, Tifton, Poulan, Ty Ty, Mystic, Worth, Terrell, Sycamore, Sumner, Rebecca, Amboy, Osierfield, Tempy, Harding, Waterloo, Pinetta, and Inaha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ben Hill; Irwin; Tift; Turner; Worth
